        public List<Object[]> findAuthoredMessageCountForAllStudents()
        Specified by:
        findAuthoredMessageCountForAllStudents in interface MessageForumsMessageManager
        Returns:
        Each item in the list will be an array consisting of two elements. The element at index 0 will correspond to the student's id and the element at index 1 will correspond to the number of messages that student has authored in the site.

      • findMessageCountsForMainPage

        public List<Object[]> findMessageCountsForMainPage(Collection<Long> topicIds)
        Specified by:
        findMessageCountsForMainPage in interface MessageForumsMessageManager
        Parameters:
        topicIds - The list of topic ids for which we want to gather the message counts.
        Returns:
        A list of arrays where each array will contain exactly two values. Index 0, a Long, will be the topicId and index 1, an Integer, will be the total number of messages under that topic (excluding any messages flagged as DRAFT or DELETED).

      • findReadMessageCountsForMainPage

        public List<Object[]> findReadMessageCountsForMainPage(Collection<Long> topicIds)
        Specified by:
        findReadMessageCountsForMainPage in interface MessageForumsMessageManager
        Parameters:
        topicIds - The list of topic ids for which we want to gather the message counts.
        Returns:
        A list of arrays where each array will contain exactly two values. Index 0, a Long, will be the topicId and index 1, an Integer, will be the total number of messages under that topic that the current user has read (excluding any messages flagged as DRAFT or DELETED).
